---
name: Pull Request / 拉取请求
about: Create a pull request to contribute code / 创建拉取请求以贡献代码
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

## Description / 描述
Brief description of what this PR changes / 简要描述此 PR 更改的内容

## Type of Change / 更改类型
Please delete options that are not relevant / 请删除不相关的选项
- [ ] Bug fix / Bug 修复
- [ ] New feature / 新功能
- [ ] Breaking change / 破坏性更改
- [ ] Documentation update / 文档更新
- [ ] Performance improvement / 性能改进
- [ ] Code style / 代码风格
- [ ] Refactoring / 重构
- [ ] Test / 测试

## Testing / 测试
Please describe the tests you ran to verify your changes / 请描述您为验证更改而运行的测试
- [ ] Unit tests pass / 单元测试通过
- [ ] Manual testing completed / 手动测试完成
- [ ] Cross-platform testing / 跨平台测试

## Screenshots / 截图
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your changes / 如果适用，请添加截图以帮助说明您的更改

## Checklist / 清单
Please go through this checklist before submitting your PR / 在提交 PR 之前请检查此清单
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines / 代码遵循项目的样式指南
- [ ] Self-review of the code has been completed / 已完成代码自我审查
- [ ] Code has been formatted using dotnet-format / 已使用 dotnet-format 格式化代码
- [ ] All tests pass locally / 所有测试在本地通过
- [ ] Documentation has been updated if needed / 如需要，文档已更新
- [ ] No breaking changes without proper discussion / 没有经过适当讨论的破坏性更改

## Additional Context / 其他上下文
Add any other context about the pull request here / 在此处添加有关拉取请求的任何其他上下文
